article: It was very late when we came out of the cinema. We knew the last train would leave  _  11:15 , so we ran as  _  as we could to the station. It was just after 11: 15 when we  arrived at  the station, but the trains often leave a little  _  and there was a train standing at Platform 1 , so we got in. We  waited  for half an hour, then we got  _  . We found the ticket collector and asked him  _  the train was going to leave. "Tomorrow morning at six o clock," he told us. There were  _  taxis outside the station.  _  we walked home. It  _  us nearly two hours. The next morning we felt very tired.
